name: SEO Nerd
description: Eeny, meeny, misty: what’cha gonna click on the list-y? Regardless if you’re using Google or any other search engine, according to statistics – users almost exclusively click on search results on the first page! Often they even only choose one of the top three. A nerd knows what he needs to optimize in order to be on top of Google with your website. Looking for more traffic on your website and would like to convert visitors to customers? Then consider your search…OVER!
